snippet: Christopher Knight’s emergence from 27 years in the woods of Maine captured the imagination of people around the world, but some burglary victims remain annoyed.
abstract: Christopher Knight’s emergence from 27 years in woods of Maine captures imagination of people around the world, but area burglary victims remain annoyed; police say Knight has confessed to having committed at least 1,000 burglaries, in search of provisions to sustain himself, in his almost three decades living as hermit.
lead_paragraph: Christopher Knight’s emergence from 27 years in the woods of Maine captured the imagination of people around the world, but some burglary victims remain annoyed.

headline.seo: Hermit in Maine Is Legend to Some, and Thief to Others
headline.main: ‘Boo Radley’ of the Woods? Not to All Maine Neighbors
headline.print_headline: ‘Boo Radley’ of the Woods? Not to All Maine Neighbors
